scripts.generate-connect-profile-client: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}/:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate --input-spec /local/openapi.yml --generator-name typescript --additional-properties supportsES6=false --output /local/test/clients/connect-profile
scripts.generate-connect-profile-client-node: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}/:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate --input-spec /local/openapi.yml --generator-name typescript-node --additional-properties supportsES6=true --output /local/test/clients/connect-profile-node
scripts.generate-connect-profile-client-axios: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}/:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate --input-spec /local/openapi.yml --generator-name typescript-axios --additional-properties supportsES6=true --output /local/test/clients/connect-profile-axios
